steps.description: Clone or access the project repository.
Set up the project environment according to documentation.
Review the codebase for potential bugs using static analysis tools.
Manually inspect code for logical or runtime errors.
Identify and document one specific bug found in the codebase.
Develop and implement a fix for the identified bug.
Test the project to confirm the bug is resolved and no new issues are introduced.
Review the fix for correctness and adherence to project standards.
